schema.title: JSON schema for Codecov configuration files

tests.description: llama-70b generated negative; focus on oneOf keyword
tests.rust_error: {"flag1":{"joined":true,"required":true,"ignore":["path1","path2"],"paths":["path1","path2"],"assume":["path1","path2"]},"flag2":{"joined":true,"required":true,"ignore":["path1","path2"],"paths":["path1","path2"],"assume":["path1","path2"]},"flag3":["path1","path2"]} is not valid under any of the schemas listed in the 'oneOf' keyword
tests.python_error:
['path1', 'path2'] is not of type 'object'

Failed validating 'type' in schema[1]['additionalProperties']:
    {'type': 'object',
     'properties': {'joined': {'type': 'boolean'},
                    'required': {'type': 'boolean'},
                    'ignore': {'type': 'array',
                               'items': {'type': 'string'}},
                    'paths': {'type': 'array', 'items': {'type': 'string'}},
                    'assume': {'type': ['boolean', 'array'],
                               'items': {'type': 'string'}}}}

On instance['flag3']:
    ['path1', 'path2']
